Name: Musical Artist
Description: A musical artist can be an individual or a group that performs or makes music. Musical artists should typically have performed in front of an audience on a regular basis or have recorded musical tracks or musical albums.

Properties.Name: Buy or download Web page
Properties.Description: Web page where one can buy or download recordings by this artist

Properties.Name: Active as Musical Artist (end)
Properties.Description: The date on which this artist ceased activity

Properties.Name: Active as Musical Artist (start)
Properties.Description: The date on which this artist became active

Properties.Name: Musical Genres
Properties.Description: Genre(s) of music recorded by this artist

Properties.Name: Musical Artist Home Page
Properties.Description: Official home page for this artist

Properties.Name: Record Labels
Properties.Description: The record company labels under which this artist has released work

Properties.Name: Place Musical Career Began
Properties.Description: The place of origin of this artist as a musician (not necessarily place of birth)

Properties.Name: Supporting artists
Properties.Description: Musicians who have performed live or on recordings with this artist. For bands, this property should only be used for musicians who are not also members of the band (this includes members of a band whose name includes that of one of the members such as Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers).

Properties.Name: Tribute acts
Properties.Description: Musical artists that perform or record as tribute acts of this artist.
